Someone from a different seed figured out a different solution - 

okezzeko at 2011-08-15 22:48 CET:
for all of you that have problem with ''not responding'' when instalation reaches 100 %, and loading wheel spins forever...DO THIS:
click right mouse button on AOESETUP.exe and go to the properties, then go to the compatibility ''card''..and below in compatibility mode, choose WIN 98 ...and start instalation again.
it worked for me.. WIN7 x32 ;)
